alert.note: Alert for Southern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued September 29 at 5:30AM CDT until September 29 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility as low as one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Illinois, Southern Cook County. In Indiana, Lake IN County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility may vary considerably across the area. Pockets of dense fog may be encountered along portions of Interstate 80 in addition to more rural areas.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
